name: The retrofit performance gap – how big is it?
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Emerging evidence suggests a gap between predicted and actual energy performance of retrofitted buildings. This has implications for meeting the UK’s carbon reduction targets and the wider UK energy requirements and provision. This seminar will explore the causes of the ‘retrofit performance gap’ in relation to housing by looking at discrepancies which may be built in at the design stage, lack of performance occurring at the construction stage and changes through use at the operational stage.

presentations.name: The design tools
presentations.speakers: Chris Wilford, Associate Director, PRP Architects

presentations.name: The contractor's perspective
presentations.speakers: Nigel Banks, Sustainability Director, Keepmoat Ltd

presentations.name: How far do outcomes meet expectations?
